question: 思想
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>concept</kanji> you <kanji>think</kanji> about is your <vocabulary>thought</vocabulary>s. It is your <vocabulary>idea</vocabulary>s. As a group, they form your <vocabulary>ideology</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. You haven't learned the on'yomi for <ja>思</ja> yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

All your <vocabulary>thought</vocabulary>s and <vocabulary>idea</vocabulary>s are about <reading>shee</reading>p (<ja>し</ja>) right now. You just can't stop thinking about sheep. Are you thinking about sheep right now? What kind of sheep are they?
